availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Calvert (Boone County, Kentucky, sheriff and politician)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, sheriff and politician. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Calvert. Father of Lewis L. Calvert, Samuel Calvert, James Calvert, Jr., and Mariah J. Calvert. Sheriff of Boone County in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky for Boone County from 1861 to 1863. Member of the Union Party.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Boone, Burlington, p. 40; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Boone County, Burlington, p. 5; "Election Returns," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), August 13, 1861, p. 4; "Kentucky Legislature," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), September 07, 1861, p. 2; Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, eds., History of Kentucky (Covington, Ky.: Collins & Co., 1878), 51.
